name: Dion Robot
description: A Powerful  Telegram group management bot with autobots theme.

TOKEN.description: Your bot token. Get one from @BotFather duh

API_KEY.description: Get API_ID from my.telegram.org or @ScrapDionRobot, used for telethon based modules.

API_HASH.description: Get API_HASH from my.telegram.org or @ScrapDionRobot, used for telethon based modules.

SQLALCHEMY_DATABASE_URI.description: Your postgres sql db, empty this field if you dont have one.

OWNER_ID.description: Your user ID as an integer.

DEL_CMDS.description: Set this to True if you want to delete command messages from users who don't have the perms to run that command.

SPAMWATCH_API.description: Spamwatch API Token, Get one from @SpamWatchBot.

ALLOW_EXCL.description: Set this to True if you want ! to be a command prefix along with /. Recommended is True

NO_LOAD.description: Dont load these modules cause they shit, space separation

STRICT_GBAN.description: Enforce gbans across new groups as well as old groups. When a gbanned user talks, he will be banned.
